name: Sky Survivor | Airplane Flight Simulator
description:
Discover our fantastic new airplane survivor game!

You're flying in the air with an increasing aircraft traffic that you have to dodge in order to survive!

You'll have to stay focused well and make sure to have your eyes wide open!

Choose your airplane and begin to accumulate achievements to unlock other great commercial aircrafts!

This game is an endless survival flight game. This means that you can fly until you crash your airplane with another one!

Tilt your device left or right to pilot your aircraft!

Collect all the coins you encounter to unlock new challenges!

Show your friends who is the fastest pilot with the scoreboard!

Don't allow your friends to survive longer than you in this flight simulator game!

Bring your plane to it's maximum speed with the nitros and proclaim yourself the champion of this flight survival game!

Once you master your aircraft you will discover new amusing power ups that will make this game your favorite!

Features:

◉ Different unlockable commercial aircrafts!
◉ Extreme Speed!
◉ Leader boards!
◉ Explosions!
◉ Funny power ups!
◉ Stunning 3D graphics!
◉ Addictive and exciting music!
◉ Free!

Beat your friends in the most amazing flight game available!

You can spend hours and hours playing to improve your skills. Become a pilot master and be the real leader of the game in the world!

Do you have what it takes to control a plane and overcome any adversity?

Download this flight simulator game now and make sure to rate it in order to attract more players!

Follow us on Twitter: @bravocterogames
Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/bravocterogames
